FunctionLevelAnalysis.Deposit: Handles deposits of Ether, updating Holders if msg.value exceeds MinDeposit.
FunctionLevelAnalysis.WitdrawTokenToHolder: Withdraws specified tokens to a holder address if the holder has a positive balance.
FunctionLevelAnalysis.WithdrawToHolder: Withdraws Ether to a specified address if the caller has a balance in Holders and it exceeds the requested withdrawal amount.

DecisionPoints.Description: Ensures deposits meet the minimum requirement.
Checks if the holder has a balance before allowing token withdrawal.
Checks both the callerâ€™s balance and the amount requested for Ether withdrawal.

StateTransitionPoints.Description: Updated when tokens or Ether are deposited or withdrawn.
Updated in the confirmOwner function if newOwner confirms ownership transfer.
